VNS_desc: This strategy appeals to people's sensations (e.g., vision, hearing) to stimulate negative emotions intuitively.
This strategy links viewers with realistic things behind the data, such as real scenes and real characters.
This strategy elicits negative emotions by using punchy or forceful language to inform viewers of something bad.
This strategy triggers negative emotions by removing people's ability to control the things happening during their viewing process.
This strategy puts people in an uncertain position for a relatively long time and thus triggers negative emotions.
This strategy elicits negative emotions by deliberately setting a task for viewers and enticing them to fail.
